content.raw:
@{5b5b1c941394ae6a72c021df} thanks :slight_smile: … by default we log everything, but with SubT Virtual Tunnel we had to minimize it. The first dropped thing was ROS input and the next was HD video \(both very large streams\). Because the only way to debug was via ROS stdout we dumped the log there at the end \(as text\).

Here is example of logfile used in the finals … a bit dirty :disappointed: 

[https://github.com/robotika/osgar/blob/SUBT\_VIRTUAL\_VER25/subt/zmq-subt-x2.json](https://github.com/robotika/osgar/blob/SUBT_VIRTUAL_VER25/subt/zmq-subt-x2.json)
content.html:
@Hector Escobar thanks … by default we log everything, but with SubT Virtual Tunnel we had to minimize it. The first dropped thing was ROS input and the next was HD video (both very large streams). Because the only way to debug was via ROS stdout we dumped the log there at the end (as text).

Here is example of logfile used in the finals … a bit dirty

https://github.com/robotika/osgar/blob/SUBT_VIRTUAL_VER25/subt/zmq-subt-x2.json
